text: (Wibuke) ubwo mushiki wawe yagendaga (agukurikiye maze akabwira abagutoraguye) ati “Ese mbarangire uwamurera?” Nuko tukugarura kwa nyoko kugira ngo yishime kandi ntakomeze kugira agahinda. Hanyuma uza kwica umuntu (w’umunyamisiri, utabigambiriye), tugukiza akababaro (igihe wicuzaga tukakubabarira, tukanagukiza imigambi y’abashakaga kukwica), nuko tukunyuza mu bigeragezo bikomeye. Nyuma waje guhungira mu bantu b’i Madiyani imyaka myinshi, nuko uza kugaruka (mu Misiri) nk’uko byagenwe, yewe Musa
